title: Visualizing the Palmer Penguins Dataset
text: The Palmer Penguins dataset is a popular alternative to the Iris dataset, providing information about three penguin species. This tutorial demonstrates how to create a simple yet informative scatterplot to explore the relationship between flipper length and body mass across species.

title: Visualizing the Palmer Penguins Dataset
text: The Palmer Penguins dataset is a popular alternative to the Iris dataset, providing information about three penguin species. This tutorial demonstrates how to create a simple yet informative scatterplot to explore the relationship between flipper length and body mass across species.

title: Visualizing the Palmer Penguins Dataset
text:
Importing Necessary Libraries
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

title: Visualizing the Palmer Penguins Dataset
text:
Loading the Dataset
# Load the dataset
url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pic16b-ucla/24W/main/datasets/palmer_penguins.csv"
penguins = pd.read_csv(url)

title: Visualizing the Palmer Penguins Dataset
text:
Data Visualization
Below is the code to create a scatterplot visualizing the relationship between flipper length and body mass for each penguin species.
# Create the scatterplot
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
sns.scatterplot(
    data=penguins,
    x="Flipper Length (mm)",
    y="Body Mass (g)",
    hue="Species",
    style="Species",
    palette="Set2"
)

# Add labels and titles
plt.title("Flipper Length vs Body Mass of Palmer Penguins", fontsize=16)
plt.xlabel("Flipper Length (mm)", fontsize=12)
plt.ylabel("Body Mass (g)", fontsize=12)
plt.legend(title="Species", fontsize=10)
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

title: Visualizing the Palmer Penguins Dataset
text:
Output
The scatterplot below shows the relationship between flipper length and body mass, color-coded by species:



Scatterplot of Flipper Length vs Body Mass

title: Visualizing the Palmer Penguins Dataset
text:
Conclusion
This scatterplot provides a clear visualization of how flipper length and body mass vary across penguin species. Such visualizations can be extended to explore other variables in the dataset, providing deeper insights into the characteristics of each species.
